ya5.3.5:4.1: ⇒ Yo dukkhasaccaṃ parijānāti so samudayasaccaṃ pajahissatīti?
ya5.3.5:5.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ pajahissati so dukkhasaccaṃ parijānātīti?
ya5.3.5:6.1: ⇒ Yo dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti so samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissatīti?
ya5.3.5:7.1: Ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānanti, no ca samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissanti.
ya5.3.5:7.2: Arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti samudayasaccañca nappajahissanti.
ya5.3.5:8.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissati so dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānātīti?
ya5.3.5:9.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissati, no ca dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti.
ya5.3.5:9.2: Arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te samudayasaccañca nappajahissanti dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti.
